channel.title: HELP! making item do different things
channel.description:
i want to know how to make an item that when u wield i makes able to pk any where. i want to make my server have a highway mask that when 2 players wield they can both attack each other any where (but the both have to wear ). but i want them not to loose items so i kinda want to to be like fun pk
if u have nay clue plz help :) tyvm
